entries.journal_entry_description: Marium Valmont has hired you to collect five different substances that are being stored on the Avatar Space Platform for her mysterious client.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Look for an unmarked case that is lined with glass tubes filled with a greyish tar like substance. Take one of these tubes.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Inside of WARM STORAGE UNIT 2 are small vials of smoke. Collect one of these.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Look for a foot locker located in the security office. Inside should be a series of baggies containing green powder. Collect one of these baggies.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Located inside of the cold storage freezer marked SLEEP MEDICATION is a case of unmarked bottles. Take one of these cases.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Break into locker SR-71. There are a number of unlabled brown sacks located inside this locker. Take one.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Valmont wants you to collect five items that she knows are stored on the Avatar Space Platform. She refused to tell you want the substances are or what they are going to be used for. But she has promised that she will pay you well for a complete set.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Now that you have collect all the strange substances that Valmont wanted, return to her and make your drop off.
